selected_quotes: My paper on instrumental variables for estimating causal interactions is now in print at JASA
The analysis of two voter mobilization field experiments provides the first evidence of diminishing returns to follow-up…
Some interesting nuggets on (diminishing) returns of contacting voters in here
How to use instrumental variable methods in 2x2 factorial experiments when subjects don't comply. JASA link

citation.journal: Journal of the American Statistical Association
citation.title:
